Questions.Question: Who is the main character in the 'Harry Potter' series?
Questions.Explanation: Harry Potter is the protagonist of the 'Harry Potter' series, a young wizard who battles against the dark wizard Lord Voldemort.

Questions.Question: Which actor portrays Iron Man in the Marvel Cinematic Universe?
Questions.Explanation: Robert Downey Jr. plays the role of Tony Stark, also known as Iron Man, in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

Questions.Question: In the 'Star Wars' franchise, who is Luke Skywalker's father?
Questions.Explanation: Darth Vader, formerly known as Anakin Skywalker, is revealed to be Luke Skywalker's father in 'Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back.'

Questions.Question: Which actress portrays Katniss Everdeen in 'The Hunger Games' series?
Questions.Explanation: Jennifer Lawrence plays the role of Katniss Everdeen, the brave and resourceful protagonist in 'The Hunger Games' series.

Questions.Question: Who directed the 'Lord of the Rings' trilogy?
Questions.Explanation: Peter Jackson directed the epic fantasy adventure films based on J.R.R. Tolkien's 'The Lord of the Rings' novels.

Questions.Question: Which actor portrays Captain Jack Sparrow in the 'Pirates of the Caribbean' series?
Questions.Explanation: Johnny Depp brings the eccentric and charismatic Captain Jack Sparrow to life in the 'Pirates of the Caribbean' series.

Questions.Question: Who is the main villain in the 'James Bond' franchise?
Questions.Explanation: Ernst Stavro Blofeld is the recurring arch-nemesis of James Bond, appearing in multiple films in the franchise.

Questions.Question: Which actress portrays Black Widow in the Marvel Cinematic Universe?
Questions.Explanation: Scarlett Johansson plays the role of Natasha Romanoff, also known as Black Widow, in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

Questions.Question: In the 'Fast and Furious' franchise, what is Dominic Toretto's catchphrase?
Questions.TrueAnswer: I live my life a quarter mile at a time.
Questions.Explanation: Dominic Toretto's catchphrase, 'I live my life a quarter mile at a time,' reflects his love for cars and the thrill of racing.

Questions.Question: Which actor portrays Wolverine in the 'X-Men' film series?
Questions.Explanation: Hugh Jackman is known for his portrayal of the mutant superhero Wolverine in the 'X-Men' film series.

Questions.Question: Who is the main antagonist in the 'Jurassic Park' franchise?
Questions.Explanation: The Tyrannosaurus Rex, often referred to as T-Rex, is the iconic and fearsome antagonist in the 'Jurassic Park' franchise.

Questions.Question: Which actor portrays Batman in 'The Dark Knight' trilogy?
Questions.Explanation: Christian Bale dons the cape and cowl to portray the brooding and complex character of Batman in 'The Dark Knight' trilogy.

Questions.Question: Who is the main character in the 'Toy Story' franchise?
Questions.Explanation: Woody, a pull-string cowboy doll, is the central character in the heartwarming 'Toy Story' franchise.

Questions.Question: Which actress portrays Hermione Granger in the 'Harry Potter' series?
Questions.Explanation: Emma Watson brings intelligence and bravery to the role of Hermione Granger in the 'Harry Potter' series.

Questions.Question: In the 'Avengers' film series, who is Thor's adoptive brother?
Questions.Explanation: Loki, the God of Mischief, is Thor's adoptive brother and a recurring antagonist in the 'Avengers' film series.

Questions.Question: Which actor portrays James Bond in the 007 film series?
Questions.Explanation: Daniel Craig is the current actor who portrays the iconic British spy James Bond in the 007 film series.

Questions.Question: Who is the main character in the 'John Wick' film series?
Questions.Explanation: John Wick, a retired hitman seeking vengeance, is the central character in the action-packed 'John Wick' film series.

Questions.Question: Which actress portrays Rey in the 'Star Wars' sequel trilogy?
Questions.Explanation: Daisy Ridley plays the role of Rey, a powerful Force-sensitive scavenger, in the 'Star Wars' sequel trilogy.

Questions.Question: In the 'Transformers' film series, who is the leader of the Autobots?
Questions.Explanation: Optimus Prime, a noble and courageous Autobot, is the revered leader in the 'Transformers' film series.

Questions.Question: Which actor portrays Tony Stark's best friend, James Rhodes, in the Marvel Cinematic Universe?
Questions.Explanation: Don Cheadle takes on the role of James Rhodes, also known as War Machine, in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

Questions.Question: Who is the main antagonist in the 'Mission: Impossible' film series?
Questions.Explanation: Solomon Lane, the leader of the Syndicate, serves as the primary antagonist in the 'Mission: Impossible' film series.
